title: Don't Die with Your Song Unsung
description: How much could your life change in 31 days? Gary Russo started the month of August, 2011 as an ironworker, Local 40. He ended the month as the "2nd Avenue Subway Sinatra," loved by millions and earning money through his music. If you're so stuck doing what you need to do that you can't find the time to do what you love, let Gary's story inspire you to change your perspective, set goals, and take action to achieve them. With expert advice from Positive Psychology practitioner and Don't Die series curator Dr. Andrea Goeglein, Don't Die with Your Song Unsung shows you how to transform your life so that you can achieve success by doing what you love.
author: Gary Russo
